p: The antibacterial and antioxidant assay data generated by triplicate measurements were reported using mean ± standard deviation. Analyses were performed using GraphPad Prism version 5.00 for Windows, (GraphPad Software, San Diego California USA, www.graphpad.com”). Groups were analyzed for significant differences using a linear model of variance analysis (ANOVA) test for comparisons, with level significance at p < 0.05 ( Supplementary Information).
